item.title: Hugo Website
item.description: The Source Code of the Website The site is based on Hugo which is the word’s fastest framework for build websites. The hugo theme of the website, Massive, is developed by Bootstrap and JavaScript according to the requirements of personal academic homepage, blog and others. Maybe I would post more different componments or pages on it in the future.
